user_query: I want to find the address, city, state, and zip code of a business with tax ID 84447804000123 in Brazil, generate a street view, and view the map of the surroundings.

TaskList.description: Query the business details using the provided tax ID to retrieve the address, city, state, and zip code.
Generate a street view for the retrieved business address to visualize the establishment.
View the map of the surrounding area based on the retrieved business address.
